resources.string:
1.S = d/t
 2.a =(v−u)/t
 3.v = ∆s/∆t
 4.v = ds/dt
 5.a = ∆v/∆t
 6.a =dv/dt
 7.v = v0 + at
 8.s = s0 + v0t + ½at2
 9.v2 = v02 + 2a(s − s0)
 10.v = ½(v + v0)
 11.∑F = ma
 12.∑F = dp/dt
 13.W = mg
 14.p = mv
 15.ac = v2/r
 16.ac = w2r 17.W = F∆s cos θ
 18.W = F∆s cos θ
 19.F∆s cos θ = ∆E
 20.W = F∆s cos θ
 21.K = ½mv2
 22.K = p2/2m
 23.τ = rF sin θ
 24.τ = r × F
 25.I = ∑mr2
 26.Fg = Gm1m2/r2
 27.g= Gm/r2
 28.Vg =Gm/r
 29.T=2π√(ℓ/g)
 30.f=1/T
 31.ω = 2πf
 32.ρ = m/V
 33.P=F/A
 34.P = P0 + ρgh
 35.A1v1 = A2v2
 36.∆ℓ = αℓ0∆T
 37.∆A = 2αA0∆T
 38.∆V = 3αV0∆T
 39.∆V = βV0∆T
 40.Q = mc∆T
 41.PV = nRT
 42.P=∆Q/∆t
 43.P=dQ/dt
 44.v = fλ
 45.f(x,t) = A sin(2π(ft − x/λ) + φ)
 46.f=1/T
 47.F=k(q1q2/r2)
 48.F=(1/4πε0)x(q1q2/r2)
 49.E=Fe/q
We provides users a valuable resource for quickly accessing a wide range of formulas from different areas of mathematics and physics.
With options for a Mathematical calculator, BMI and percentage calculator, you can access a range of useful tools all in one place.
